verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:11
verses.text: Then said she, I pray thee, let the king remember the Lord thy God, that thou wouldest not suffer the revengers of blood to destroy any more, lest they destroy my son. And he said, As the Lord liveth, there shall not one hair of thy son fall to the earth.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 14:12
verses.text: Then the woman said, Let thine handmaid, I pray thee, speak one word unto my lord the king. And he said, Say on.
